content.raw: I am currently working on ornithopter model. I am not good in aerodynamics. I used LiftDrag plugin on wings of my model. It could achieve reasonable lift at a certain flapping frequency. But, Liftdrag plugin is solely created for aircrafts (not sure). Is it correct to apply the plugin to ornithopters?. [Note: The model lifts only when LiftDrag plugin is applied]
content.html: I am currently working on ornithopter model. I am not good in aerodynamics. I used LiftDrag plugin on wings of my model. It could achieve reasonable lift at a certain flapping frequency. But, Liftdrag plugin is solely created for aircrafts (not sure). Is it correct to apply the plugin to ornithopters?. [Note: The model lifts only when LiftDrag plugin is applied]
